column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " I need to borrow Appa . "
#Text=Aang says : " Why ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh .
#Text=What 's going on ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're going to find the man who took my mother from me .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Sokka told me the story of what happened .
#Text=I know who did it and I know how to find him .
#Text=" Aang says : " Um ... and what exactly do you think this will accomplish ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Ugh , I knew you would n't understand .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait !
#Text=Stop !
#Text=I do understand .
#Text=You 're feeling unbelievable pain and rage .
#Text=How do think I felt about the sandbenders when they stole Appa ?
#Text=How do you think I felt about the Fire Nation when I found out what happened to my people ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " She needs this , Aang .
#Text=This is about getting closure and justice .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't think so .
#Text=I think it 's about getting revenge .
#Text=" Katara says : " Fine , maybe it is !
#Text=Maybe that 's what I need !
#Text=Maybe that 's what he deserves !
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , you sound like Jet .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not the same !
#Text=Jet attacked the innocent .
#Text=This man , he 's a monster .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara , she was my mother , too , but I think Aang might be right .
#Text=" Katara says : " Then you did n't love her the way I did !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara !
#Text=" Aang says : " The monks used to say that revenge is like a two - headed rat viper .
#Text=While you watch your enemy go down , you 're being poisoned yourself .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's cute , but this is n't air temple preschool .
#Text=It 's the real world .
#Text=" Katara says : " Now that I know he 's out there ... now that I know we can find him , I feel like I have no choice .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , you do have a choice : forgiveness .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's the same as doing nothing !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , it 's not .
#Text=It 's easy to do nothing , but it 's hard to forgive .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not just hard , it 's impossible .
#Text="
